newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's Daehan buys 25,500 tonnes of U.S. wheat.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's Daehan buys 25,500 tonnes of U.S. wheat.

text.p: South Korea's Daehan Flour Mills Co Ltd on Friday bought 25,500 tonnes of U.S. No.1 wheat from Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co Ltd, a company official said.
The company official said shipment was set for July 20 to August 20 to the western port of Inchon.

The official said the total amount would be split into four positions -- 12,500 tonnes of western white/soft white, 1,000 tonnes of western white club wheat, 6,000 tonnes of hard red winter (protein minimum 11.5 percent), and 6,000 tonnes of dark northern spring (protein minimum 14 percent).
Details of the purchase are as follows:
